title: can i have some help
body: Ok there is this website called rewards1 were you can get points by doing surveys and this takes along time, i need 1000 points for $10 rp for league of legends but i only have 300, but there is thing thing called refferals so i can refer people to the site so they can start doing it as well and i also get 20%-50% of the points you get (like if you got 50 points then i would get 10 to 25 points) so i was wondering if everyone could go on this link and help me please http://www.rewards1.com/astrafart it would mean a lot to me.

replies.body:
Hey there astrapoof,

I personally wouldn't trust this site. Be careful when you sign up for stuff.

Yeh I normally wouldn't but i have some friends that have brought stuff on this website and if you type up a question everyone give legit answers, like i asked someone if they play league of legends and he said that his friends want him to but he ran home before his friends could tie him down and also there are surveys from really trusted sites.
Lol. inb4 you get 1,000 points and you don't get a single Riot point. It's most likely a scam dude. You are doing surveys and giving them money through ads and traffic.
